Use Code Description: All church uses. This includes rectories, convents, and Sunday schools. The building record is coded according to the design type of the building.
Private and parochial schools. (For public schools use an "8800" property use classification and "7200" building design type if building records exist.)
A convalescent hospital, nursing home, or related institution, which provides essentially medical or recuperative services
Homes for aged and others. Includes most institutions which provide essentially residential services, such as orphanages, resthomes, or retirement homes.
Senior day care centers: Adult care facility - Social and recreational services
Senior day centers: Adult day services - skilled care services offered.
Miscellaneous Government-Owned properties (unless BOE assessed) that do not fall into any other classification.

Miscellaneous Government-Owned properties (unless BOE assessed) that do not fall into any other classification. Other improvements only.
Miscellaneous Government-Owned properties (unless BOE assessed) that do not fall into any other classification. Lift.

Miscellaneous Government-Owned properties (unless BOE assessed) that do not fall into any other classification.Vacant parcel that has improvement value due to existing non-structural other improvements(eg fences,blockwalls, light fixtures, spur track,paving that is not used for parking, service station canopies etc.0 This is used for Measure B purposes.
